protein.specific_function: mRNA-capping methyltransferase that methylates the N7 position of the added guanosine to the 5'-cap structure of mRNAs. Binds RNA containing 5'-terminal GpppC.

go_class.description: transcription from RNA polymerase II promoter

reference.reference_text: Tsukamoto T, Shibagaki Y, Niikura Y, Mizumoto K: Cloning and characterization of three human cDNAs encoding mRNA (guanine-7-)-methyltransferase, an mRNA cap methylase. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1998 Oct 9;251(1):27-34.
